attributes.action: NEW LAW TO FORCE EA to remove LOOT BOXES
attributes.additional_details:
Loot boxes have most recently been declared as gamberling in the Belgium courts and have forced EA to remove this system from their. Games. In FIFA games they are sold as a age 3 and over game.
Yet this gamberling system is in place. School children are spending their pocket money on this gamberling. Stores such has Game. Have even held competitions where children could enter to win gaming credit to gamble. 
This clearly needs to be resolved as EA are using it to gain profits
attributes.background:
EA / Electronic Arts hold the monopoly on electronic gaming across all platforms and personally design games around loot boxes which it has recently been declared as Gamberling in Belgium courts.
